General.Name: Sai Gon Ha Noi Commercial Joint Stock Bank
General.Description: Saigon - Hanoi Commercial Joint Stock Bank, together with its subsidiaries, provides various banking products and services to organizations and individuals in Vietnam. The company offers savings and current accounts; short, medium, and long term deposits; debit and credit cards; and short, medium, and long term loans, including home, car, consumer, business, working capital, rubber, and agriculture product loans, as well as loans mortgaged with valuable papers. It also provides money transfer, factoring, guarantee, business overdraft, international settlement and trade finance, forex trading and treasury, and investment and hedging services, as well as online, mobile, phone, and SMS banking services. It operates through branches and transaction offices. The company was formerly known as Nhon Ai Rural Commercial Joint Stock Bank and changed its name to Saigon - Hanoi Commercial Joint Stock Bank in September 2009. Saigon - Hanoi Commercial Joint Stock Bank was founded in 1993 and is headquartered in Hanoi, Vietnam.
